title: Question regarding Yi's immunity to slows
body: Is he affected by the damage reduction from Exhaust, and the attack speed debuff from Wither (Nasus W) while he ults?

replies.body: His attack speed is NOT slowed.

He can't be slowed when he uses his ultimate.

FH, RO, wither, does not slow him.

only effects movement speed slows.


And yes he is reduced by exhaust and such.
